languages.text: "Я могу понять ход твоих мыслей, элантах. Каждая форма, цвет, сущность и существо обладают своим собственным очарованием и способностью вызывать эмоции. Мириады звезд во тьме. Неповторимость пустотных кристаллов. Множество разумных и простейших существ, заполонивших галактику... Мир проявляется в бесконечном многообразии — и в этом его истинное величие".

"I can follow the line of your thoughts, elantach. Every form, colour, creature, and being possesses its own charm and capacity to stir our emotions. Millions of stars in the darkness. The inimitability of void crystals. The plethora of intelligent and primitive life forms that inhabit the galaxy... The world manifests itself in endless diversity — and in that lies its true magnificence."
languages.original_text: "Я могу понять ход твоих мыслей, элантах. Каждая форма, цвет, сущность и существо обладают своим собственным очарованием и способностью вызывать эмоции. Мириады звезд во тьме. Неповторимость пустотных кристаллов. Множество разумных и простейших существ, заполонивших галактику... Мир проявляется в бесконечном многообразии — и в этом его истинное величие".

Millions of stars in the darkness. The inimitability of void crystals. The plethora of intelligent and primitive life forms that inhabit the galaxy... The world manifests itself in endless diversity — and in that lies its true magnificence."

"I can follow the line of your thoughts, elantach. Every form, colour, creature, and being possesses its own charm and capacity to stir our emotions. Millions of stars in the darkness. The inimitability of void crystals. The plethora of intelligent and primitive life forms that inhabit the galaxy... The world manifests itself in endless diversity — and in that lies its true magnificence."

languages.text: «Puedo seguir el hilo de tus pensamientos, elantach. Toda forma, color, criatura y ser posee su propio encanto y la capacidad de suscitarnos emociones. Millones de estrellas en la oscuridad. La singularidad de los cristales del vacío. La plétora de formas de vida inteligentes y primitivas que habitan la galaxia... El mundo se manifiesta en una diversidad ilimitada, y en ella radica su verdadera magnificencia».
languages.original_text: "I can follow the line of your thoughts, elantach. Every form, colour, creature, and being possesses its own charm and capacity to stir our emotions. Millions of stars in the darkness. The inimitability of void crystals. The plethora of intelligent and primitive life forms that inhabit the galaxy... The world manifests itself in endless diversity — and in that lies its true magnificence."

traits.locale_text: «Puedo seguir el hilo de tus pensamientos, elantach. Toda forma, color, criatura y ser posee su propio encanto y la capacidad de suscitarnos emociones. Millones de estrellas en la oscuridad. La singularidad de los cristales del vacío. La plétora de formas de vida inteligentes y primitivas que habitan la galaxia... El mundo se manifiesta en una diversidad ilimitada, y en ella radica su verdadera magnificencia».

languages.text: 「お前の言いたいことはわかる、エランタ。どんな形も、色も、生物も、存在も、独自の魅力を持ち、我らの中に感情を引き起こす力を持っている。闇の中で煌めく幾千もの星々。ヴォイドクリスタルの無限の可能性。銀河系に生息する数えきれないほどの知的および原始的な生命体…世界は果てしない多様性の中に存在し、そこに真の素晴らしさがあると思う」
languages.original_text: "I can follow the line of your thoughts, elantach. Every form, colour, creature, and being possesses its own charm and capacity to stir our emotions. Millions of stars in the darkness. The inimitability of void crystals. The plethora of intelligent and primitive life forms that inhabit the galaxy... The world manifests itself in endless diversity — and in that lies its true magnificence."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の言いたいことはわかる、エランタ。どんな形も、色も、生物も、存在も、独自の魅力を持ち、我らの中に感情を引き起こす力を持っている。闇の中で煌めく幾千もの星々。ヴォイドクリスタルの無限の可能性。銀河系に生息する数えきれないほどの知的および原始的な生命体…世界は果てしない多様性の中に存在し、そこに真の素晴らしさがあると思う」

languages.text: “我能理解你的想法，外界人。每一种形态、颜色、造物与存在，都自有其独特的魅力，激起我们千变万化的情绪。暗夜中闪烁的无尽群星、永远无法复刻的虚空晶体、广袤银河中栖息的无数智慧生命和原始生命……宇宙的伟大，正在于它的包罗万象、多姿多彩。”
languages.original_text: "I can follow the line of your thoughts, elantach. Every form, colour, creature, and being possesses its own charm and capacity to stir our emotions. Millions of stars in the darkness. The inimitability of void crystals. The plethora of intelligent and primitive life forms that inhabit the galaxy... The world manifests itself in endless diversity — and in that lies its true magnificence."

traits.locale_text: “我能理解你的想法，外界人。每一种形态、颜色、造物与存在，都自有其独特的魅力，激起我们千变万化的情绪。暗夜中闪烁的无尽群星、永远无法复刻的虚空晶体、广袤银河中栖息的无数智慧生命和原始生命……宇宙的伟大，正在于它的包罗万象、多姿多彩。”

languages.text: « J'arrive à suivre le fil de votre pensée, elantach. Chaque forme, couleur, créature ou être vivant possède son propre charme et peut susciter en nous des émotions. Les millions d'étoiles dans les ténèbres. La singularité des cristaux du vide. La pléthore de formes de vie intelligentes ou primitives qui peuplent la galaxie... Le monde se manifeste dans son infinie diversité, et en cela réside sa véritable splendeur. »
languages.original_text: "I can follow the line of your thoughts, elantach. Every form, colour, creature, and being possesses its own charm and capacity to stir our emotions. Millions of stars in the darkness. The inimitability of void crystals. The plethora of intelligent and primitive life forms that inhabit the galaxy... The world manifests itself in endless diversity — and in that lies its true magnificence."

traits.locale_text: « J'arrive à suivre le fil de votre pensée, elantach. Chaque forme, couleur, créature ou être vivant possède son propre charme et peut susciter en nous des émotions. Les millions d'étoiles dans les ténèbres. La singularité des cristaux du vide. La pléthore de formes de vie intelligentes ou primitives qui peuplent la galaxie... Le monde se manifeste dans son infinie diversité, et en cela réside sa véritable splendeur. »

languages.text: "Ich kann Eurem Gedankengang folgen, Elantach. Alle Formen, Farben, Kreaturen und Wesen besitzen ihren eigenen Charme und ihre eigene Fähigkeit, unsere Emotionen zu rühren. Millionen von Sternen in der Dunkelheit. Die Unnachahmlichkeit von Leerenkristallen. Die unzähligen intelligenten und primitiven Lebensformen, welche die Galaxie bewohnen ... Die Welt manifestiert sich in endloser Vielfalt, und darin liegt ihre wahre Herrlichkeit."
languages.original_text: "I can follow the line of your thoughts, elantach. Every form, colour, creature, and being possesses its own charm and capacity to stir our emotions. Millions of stars in the darkness. The inimitability of void crystals. The plethora of intelligent and primitive life forms that inhabit the galaxy... The world manifests itself in endless diversity — and in that lies its true magnificence."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann Eurem Gedankengang folgen, Elantach. Alle Formen, Farben, Kreaturen und Wesen besitzen ihren eigenen Charme und ihre eigene Fähigkeit, unsere Emotionen zu rühren. Millionen von Sternen in der Dunkelheit. Die Unnachahmlichkeit von Leerenkristallen. Die unzähligen intelligenten und primitiven Lebensformen, welche die Galaxie bewohnen ... Die Welt manifestiert sich in endloser Vielfalt, und darin liegt ihre wahre Herrlichkeit."

languages.text: "Düşünce zincirini anlıyorum elantach. Her bir biçim, renk, yaratık ve varlık; kendine has bir çekiciliğe ve duygularımızı etkileme yeteneğine sahiptir. Karanlıklar içindeki milyonlarca yıldız, uçsuz kristallerinin eşsizliği, galakside yaşayan sayısız zeki ve ilkel yaşam formu... Dünya, kendini sonsuz bir çeşitlilikle ortaya koyar ve gerçek ihtişamı da buradan gelir."
languages.original_text: "I can follow the line of your thoughts, elantach. Every form, colour, creature, and being possesses its own charm and capacity to stir our emotions. Millions of stars in the darkness. The inimitability of void crystals. The plethora of intelligent and primitive life forms that inhabit the galaxy... The world manifests itself in endless diversity — and in that lies its true magnificence."

traits.locale_text: "Düşünce zincirini anlıyorum elantach. Her bir biçim, renk, yaratık ve varlık kendine has bir çekiciliğe ve duygularımızı etkileme yeteneğine sahiptir. Karanlıklar içindeki milyonlarca yıldız, uçsuz kristallerinin eşsizliği, galakside yaşayan sayısız zeki ve ilkel yaşam formu... Dünya, kendini sonsuz bir çeşitlilikle ortaya koyar ve gerçek ihtişamı da buradan gelir."
